location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: 'File 5/9 Revised Procedure for Calling out Royal Naval Reserve in India'

physicalDescription.extent: This file is arranged approximately in chronological order.

Foliation: The foliation sequence commences at the page following the front cover and terminates at the back cover; these numbers written in crayon and pencil and can be found in the top right of the recto side of each folio, and the verso where there is text (i.e. f. 61).

mods.abstract: This file contains correspondence between the British Political Agent at Bahrain; the British Political Resident in the Persian Gulf at Bushire; the Foreign Department of Government of India; the Director of Customs, Bahrain; J S Black, the Chief Local Representative of the Bahrain Petroleum Company (BAPCO); Naval Staff Officer (Intelligence), Colombo; and various BAPCO employees.The correspondence concerns Special Admiralty Order R.V.52-Cand the procedure for mobilisation of Royal Naval Reserves who are overseas in parts of the British Empire, and the call up of reservists (mainly employees of BAPCO) in September/October 1938, October 1939, and into 1940 during the Second World War.
